name: Black Diamond Mercury Mitts - Women's
description: Versatile and popular mitts with removable split-finger liners. The fully waterproof shell and insulation keeps your hands comfortable across a wide range of temperatures, whether you’re mountaineering, climbing, or just out and about in the winter. Separate trigger fingers in the liners let you fiddle with zippers, buckles, and pro, without exposing your bare hands.Outer shells are light, yet abrasion-resistant nylon, with 4-way stretch.Goat leather palms, plus palm patches with Kevlar® stitching, add abrasion protection and grip.Removable liners feature waterproof BDry™ inserts, a combination of PrimaLoft® Gold and high-loft fleece for insulation, and split-fingers for frostbite-free pro placements.Target temperature range is -29 to -12°C.
